mapper.select: SELECT r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_tel, r_fileName, r_fileRoot, r_detail, r_menu, r_open, r_close, r_rate, r_category FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_tel, r_fileName, r_fileRoot, r_detail, r_menu, r_open, r_close, r_rate, r_category FROM eatstamp.rest, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP ORDER BY r_rate DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT r_num, r_name, r_tel, r_add, r_fileName, r_food FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, r_num, r_name, r_tel, r_add, r_fileName, r_food FROM eatstamp.rest, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k1}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k1}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k2}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k2}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k3}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k3}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k4}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k4}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k5}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k5}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k6}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k6}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k7}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k7}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k8}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k8}, '%') ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT r_num, r_name, r_tel, r_food FROM( SELECT r_num, r_name, r_tel, r_food FROM eatstamp.rest WHERE r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k1}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k1}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k2}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k2}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k3}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k3}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k4}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k4}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k5}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k5}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k6}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k6}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k7}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k7}, '%') OR r_food LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k8}, '%') OR r_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{k8}, '%') ) t1 ) t2

SELECT r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_tel, r_fileName, r_fileRoot, r_detail, r_menu, r_open, r_close, r_rate, r_category FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, r.r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_tel, r_fileName, r_fileRoot, r_detail, r_menu, r_open, r_close, r_rate, r_category FROM eatstamp.rest r JOIN eatstamp.r_like rl ON r.r_num = rl.r_num JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE rl.mem_num = #{mem_num} ORDER BY rl.r_like_num DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT r.r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_tel, r_fileName, r_fileRoot, r_detail, r_menu, r_open, r_close, r_rate, r_category FROM eatstamp.rest r JOIN eatstamp.r_like rl ON r.r_num = rl.r_num WHERE rl.mem_num = #{mem_num} ) t1
SELECT r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_category FROM rest WHERE r_name REGEXP #{name}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT r_num, r_name, r_add, r_food, r_category FROM rest WHERE r_name REGEXP #{name} ) t1

SELECT r_like_num FROM r_like rl
WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num} AND r_num = #{r_num}
